          <title>
            <string language="en">Stars A and B life histories</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebengeschichten der Sterne A und B</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des histoires tient le premier rôle de A et de B vie</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These Hertzsprung-Russell diagrams (H-K diagrams) illustrate the life histories of stars A and B.</string>
